description: [KeyBoy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0387) issues the command reg add “HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon” to achieve persistence.(Citation: PWC KeyBoys Feb 2017) (Citation: CitizenLab KeyBoy Nov 2016)

external_references.description: Parys, B. (2017, February 11). The KeyBoys are back in town. Retrieved June 13, 2019.
Hulcoop, A., et al. (2016, November 17). It’s Parliamentary KeyBoy and the targeting of the Tibetan Community. Retrieved June 13, 2019.
